profile.name: Andrew Gallant
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering innovative solutions at @astral-sh
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led the development of multiple high-profile projects, resulting in a 30% increase in customer satisfaction.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable architecture solutions.
Mentored junior engineers and provided code reviews to ensure best practices were followed.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Worked with clients to understand their requirements and deliver custom solutions within tight deadlines.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including bug fixes and feature enhancements.
Collaborated with other maintainers to ensure project stability and security.
